ing: 4 fluid ounces beer (such as MillerÂ® High LifeÂ®)
3 fluid ounces cola-flavored carbonated beverage (such as Coca-ColaÂ®), or more as needed
des:
"Similar to Long Island iced tea, but with a mule kick. Great for hot and humid days.
 If you are the cook, save yours for after the biscuits come out of the oven or the steaks off the grill."
ins: Fill a pitcher with ice. Add beer, orange juice, vodka, gin, rum, tequila, and triple sec; stir gently. Fill tall glasses with ice. Pour drink mixture into each glass. Top each drink off with cola-flavored beverage.
